text: Gabriela is a 1983 Brazilian erotic comedy movie directed by Bruno Barreto and is based on the 1958 novel Gabriela, Cravo e Canela. It stars Sônia Braga, Marcello Mastroianni, Antonio Cantafora, Paulo Goulart, Flávio Galvão, Joffre Soares, Nelson Xavier, Maurício do Valle, Nildo Parente and was distributed by Metro-Goldyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1983 comedy movies Category:1980s erotic movies Category:Brazilian movies Category:Movies directed by Bruno Barreto Category:Movies based on books Category:MGM movies Category:Movies set in the 1920s
title: Gabriela (1983 movie)
